data.name: Dark Oblation
data.tooltip:
Kill target enemy and gain <Bold>50%</> of their max life as energy.

Hero and Resilient enemies are instead struck for <d ref="duckiesHeroPandoraDarkObliteration_ResilientDamage.amount" style="Bold"/> damage and only give <d ref="duckiesHeroPandoraDarkObliteration_ResilientModifyEnergy.energy_mod_flat_amount" style="Bold"/> energy.
